column1: The Pit Room////Food - The only thing I got was a sliced brisket sandwich. Onions
column3: and jalapenos on the side. Very good
column4: but didn't blow my socks off or anything - don't get me wrong though
column5: still very good. I prefer moist brisket
column6: none of that lean stuff for me. I got a mix of both
column7: so the half of the sandwich that had the moist fatty slices was soo good. Piled all my onions onto the sandwich
column8: ended up with a great contrast on textures. And the pickles were very nicely pickled and had a little heat to them. The BBQ sauce was really good - slightly peppery
